ABOUT_ME.TEXT_SECTION_1: Software Developer with over 3 years of experience in high-impact projects and data analysis.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT_SECTION_2: Specialized in data extraction, transformation, and loading (ETL), performance optimization, and application security assurance.
ABOUT_ME.TEXT_SECTION_3: Expert in collaborating with multidisciplinary teams and implementing cutting-edge technologies to efficiently and effectively solve complex problems.

CONTACT.TITLE: Let's work together
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: I'm open to new opportunities and collaborations. If you have an interesting project or simply want to connect, feel free to reach out.

EXPERIENCE.DESCRIPTION: I design and develop scalable, high-performance software solutions using advanced JavaScript (ES6+), Vue, Vuetify, and Java with Spring Boot. I implement robust architectures applying SOLID principles and design patterns to ensure clean, maintainable, and easily testable code. I integrate Artificial Intelligence-based solutions to optimize processes, enhance decision-making, and strengthen business capabilities. I work on REST API design and integration, performance optimization, and continuous user experience improvement. I actively collaborate with cross-functional teams, contributing technical vision, best practices, and a results-driven strategic approach.

As part of the team, I was responsible for extracting and transforming data from Excel to store it in AWS S3, ensuring its integrity and security. I supervised the process, documented the code, and worked on data visualization to make it understandable and appealing. Additionally, I collaborated with my colleagues to meet business objectives, providing training and support to new employees in complex tasks. I utilized my experience in Java and AngularJS to optimize performance and obtain data from Restful APIs.

I was responsible for the analysis, design, and development of software using .Net Framework and ReactJS. I implemented security standards, led projects, and managed clients to ensure quality. I also handled documentation, database normalization, data transformation, and user training. I focused on selecting optimal technologies and managed roles in administrative systems.

I led projects and development teams from analysis to implementation. I used cloud services like Firebase and AWS S3 Bucket, along with the MERN stack. I optimized multimedia file handling and managed errors on Github. I ensured software security and functionality with quality assurance tests. I implemented an accounting module and provided user training. I established CI/CD pipelines and documented processes.

I provided comprehensive technical support for computer and mobile equipment, effectively resolving issues and ensuring customer satisfaction. I handled inquiries, complaints, and requests in a professional and friendly manner, resulting in high levels of satisfaction. Additionally, I managed financial transactions accurately as a cashier and demonstrated effective communication skills, building strong relationships and fostering trust in the brand.

PokeQuizAdventureGame.TITLE: Poke Quiz Adventure Game
PokeQuizAdventureGame.DESCRIPTION: An interactive quiz game inspired by the Pok√©mon universe. The project was developed using Vue 3, Vite, and TailwindCSS, integrating Vue Router for navigation, vue-i18n for internationalization, and Axios for API consumption. It includes animations powered by animate.css and UI components from Flowbite, delivering a dynamic, modern, and performance-optimized user experience.

discoveringOwls.TITLE: Discovering Owls
discoveringOwls.DESCRIPTION: A blog platform developed with Vue 3, TypeScript, and Vite, focused on publishing informative articles about owls, including species, habitats, and conservation. The project implements a modular component-based architecture, SPA navigation, and a responsive design. It integrates AI-assisted translation to generate multilingual versions of the articles, expanding international reach and improving content production efficiency.

JSPracticePlayground.TITLE: JavaScript Practice & Internships
JSPracticePlayground.DESCRIPTION: A web platform that compiles and documents all my practice work and exercises focused on mastering JavaScript. This project serves as a technical progress record, showcasing different challenges, concepts, and solutions applied over time. It is complemented by a playground-style repository where I experiment, practice logic, data structures, and multiple problem-solving approaches to continuously strengthen my skills in the language.

EliRecomienda.TITLE: Eli Recommends
EliRecomienda.DESCRIPTION: A web platform currently under development focused on publishing recommendations about products, tools, content, and useful resources. The project functions as a dynamic blog where recommendations can be organized by categories, highlight featured content, and provide a clean and engaging reading experience. It is designed with a modular and scalable architecture, allowing future enhancements such as tag systems, filtering, affiliate integrations, and SEO optimization.

HACIENDA.TITLE: Hacienda el Orosi
HACIENDA.DESCRIPTION: An internal project was developed for a livestock company, encompassing comprehensive management of payments, employees, loans, tools, animals, billing, and sales. Utilizing technologies such as React, TailwindCSS, Express.JS, and MongoDB, an efficient and scalable platform was created.

SPOTIFY.TITLE: Open Spotify
SPOTIFY.DESCRIPTION: A Spotify clone project was built to deepen understanding of Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS. This initiative explored the capabilities of these cutting-edge technologies and how they can be leveraged in modern web applications.

UNAVACUNA.TITLE: Una Vacuna
UNAVACUNA.DESCRIPTION: A university project in Next.js for the Global Applications 2021 course. Focused on implementing graphics, a robust login system, and an eye-catching, adaptable design for data management using Tailwind CSS, React, and Next.js.

GUANAMUEBLES.TITLE: Guana Muebles
GUANAMUEBLES.DESCRIPTION: An E-commerce platform designed for a company needing an online sales solution. The development involved creating a robust backend using Laravel, while the frontend was built with Angular and Bootstrap for a visually appealing and functional design.
